question: A recent MRI revealed microvascular brain disease.  I currently don't have diabetes, hypertension, or hepatitis.  However, in treatment for leukemia I did develop drug induced diabetes, fluctuations of  blood pressure, and hepatitis as a result of the chemotherapy.  I now experience short term memory loss and lack of balance issues.  In your opinion, are the current health issues related to the microvascular disease?
title: Microvascular brain disease as a result of chemo?
